name: backend
description: Backend web server for spectrum software.
author: Josh Hess

scripts.pack: cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && rm -r public && mkdir public && cp -r ../frontend/dist/* public
scripts.hotbuild: npx nodemon --watch src --watch public -e js,html,css --exec npm start
scripts.hotpack: npx nodemon --watch ../frontend/src --ext vue,ts --exec npm run pack
